executive_summary: Tom Hayes is extremely bullish on small caps, emerging markets, industrials, financials, and value stocks over growth stocks. He is pounding the table on Alibaba and Boeing, and sees a buying opportunity in Disney. He believes the market is pricing in a Trump win and a split government, which is ideal for the stock market. He is also closely watching the bond market and believes that the recent selloff is a counter-trend rally.

key_reasons: Market is pricing in pro-growth policies.
Seasonality favors buying bonds in November.
Small caps, Emerging Markets, Industrials, financials, value over growth will outperform.

macro_thesis_summary: The market is in the early stages of a bull cycle, with strong economic data and improving sentiment. The FED may not cut rates as much as the market expects, and inflation may run higher than expected. A split government is the ideal outcome for the stock market.

key_macro_data_points.tom_interpretation: China's GDP came in slightly better than expected, indicating a recovery in the Chinese economy.

key_macro_data_points.value: Low, but showing signs of weakness
key_macro_data_points.tom_interpretation: The labor market is still strong, but there are some signs of weakness, which could lead the FED to cut rates.
Corporate margins are near all-time highs and are not yet showing signs of letting up, which is a positive sign for the economy.

People were short treasuries. Last time it got this extended was September of 2023 when we were pounding the table to buy bonds and that yields were going to compress and that was the Peak at 5% 10-year Treasury and sure enough.

DIS.thesis_summary: Disney is trading at a multiple discount to the S&P 500, which has historically preceded monster rallies. Reacceleration of experiences and operating income growth in fiscal year 2026. Streaming losses are falling, and operating income is booming.
key_metrics: Operating income growth in fiscal year 2026
DIS.action: Buy Disney. "We love Disney we own Disney we uh buy Disney we visit Disney we everything Disney so happy Disney we expect a reacceleration of experiences"

risks_and_contrarian_flags: Insiders are selling into the strength in the US market.
technical_takeaways: The S&P seasonal composite since 1928 indicates that the bottom is in on October 27th, and then the market starts to rally into year-end. In election years, there may be a little bit more weakness into the end of October, and then a rally into the end of the year.
